# Diesel-Electric-Submarine-FAQs Project

This is an MkDocs documentation project for organizing and presenting frequently asked questions about diesel-electric submarines.

## Project Structure
- Documentation source files are in the `docs/` directory
- Category-based organization for different submarine topics
- MkDocs configuration in `mkdocs.yml`
- Python virtual environment for dependencies

## Development Guidelines
- Use clear, technical language appropriate for submarine enthusiasts and professionals
- Organize content by logical categories (propulsion, operations, history, etc.)
- Include proper citations and references where applicable
- Follow MkDocs best practices for documentation structure
